alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 2:35PM PST until January 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Higher winds are expected at higher elevations. * WHERE...Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Eastern Douglas County Foothills. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down with power outages expected. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
